typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Other_Sale_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as string,
		Sales_revenue as string,
		Sales_Cost as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Sales_Cost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sale_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalSalesType
ValidatedDateandIDandNumbers@ValidDateAndIdAdnNumbers, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndIDandNumbers split(not(isNull(Derived_Other_Sales_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Total_Units_Sold)),not(isNull(Derived_Total_Units_Sold)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Sales_revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Cost)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Cost)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Net_Revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Net_Revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Quantity)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Sales_Quantity)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Sales_Revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Cost)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Sales_Cost)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDateandIDandNumbers@(ValidDateAndIdAdnNumbers, InvalidDateOrIdOrNumbers)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Other_Sales_Id = toInteger(Other_Sale_Id),
		Derived_Total_Units_Sold = toDecimal(Total_Units_Sold, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Sales_revenue = toDecimal(Sales_revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Sales_Cost = toDecimal(Sales_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Sales_Net_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Net_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit = toDecimal(Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Sales_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####")) ~> ConvertDateAndIDandNumbers
InvalidDateOrIdOrNumbersErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrIdOrNumbers
ValidatedDateandIDandNumbers@InvalidDateOrIdOrNumbers derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Sales Other Id / Total Unit Sold / Sales Revenue / Sales Costs / Sales Net Revenie / Sales Net Revenue Per Unit/ Budget Sales Quantity / Budget Sales Revenue / Budget Sales Cost")) ~> InvalidDateOrIdOrNumbersErrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrIdOrNumbers, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
RelationalSalesType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Sale_Type_Code = Sale_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalIncidentType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Other_Sale_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as string,
		Sales_revenue as string,
		Sales_Cost as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Sales_Cost as string,
		Validation_Error as string,
		Sales_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sales_Type = Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Active_YN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ValidatedSalesUnitCode@ValidSalesUnitCode select(mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit,
		Active_YN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB split(not(isNull(Sales_Unit_Code)) && trim(Sales_Unit_Code) != '',
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedSalesUnitCode@(ValidSalesUnitCode, InvalidSalesUnitCode)
InvalidSalesUnitCodeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidSalesUnitCode
ValidatedSalesUnitCode@InvalidSalesUnitCode derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Sales Unit Code")) ~> InvalidSalesUnitCodeerrormessage
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidSalesUnitCode union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(input(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as string,
		Expected_Completion_Date as string,
		Planned_Completion_Date as string,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
ValidatedDatesAndNumbers@ValidDateAndNumber, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndNumbers split(not(isNull(Derived_Project_ID)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Project_Weighting)),not(isNull(Derived_Project_Weighting)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Expected_Completion_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Expected_Completion_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Planned_Completion_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Planned_Completion_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Current_Progress_Perc_Complete)),not(isNull(Derived_Current_Progress_Perc_Complete)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDatesAndNumbers@(ValidDateAndNumber, InvalidDateOrNumber)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Project_ID = toInteger(Project_ID),
		Derived_Project_Weighting = toShort(Project_Weighting),
		Derived_Expected_Completion_Date = toDate(Expected_Completion_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Planned_Completion_Date = toDate(Planned_Completion_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Current_Progress_Perc_Complete = toShort(Current_Progress_Perc_Complete)) ~> ConvertDateAndNumbers
InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrNumber
ValidatedDatesAndNumbers@InvalidDateOrNumber derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Project ID / Dates / Numbers")) ~> InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrNumber, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as string,
		Expected_Completion_Date as string,
		Planned_Completion_Date as string,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
ValidatedDateAndID@ValidDateAndID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndIncidentID split(not(isNull(Derived_Project_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDateAndID@(ValidDateAndID, InvalidDateOrID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Project_ID = toInteger(Project_ID)) ~> ConvertDateAndIncidentID
InvalidDateOrIDErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrID
ValidatedDateAndID@InvalidDateOrID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Project ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrIDErrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sales_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as string,
		Sales_Revenue as string,
		Production_Cost as string,
		Stumpage as string,
		Unit_Stumpage as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Sales_Month as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Production_Cost as string,
		Budget_Stumpage as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string,
		Species_Group as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalSpeciesType
source(output(
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalProductType
source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalPricePoint
source(output(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalSalesUnit
ValidatedTimberSalesIDandDateandDecimal@ValidDateAndTimberSalesIDandNumbers, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidSalesUnit@ValidSalesUnit select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Sales_Month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndTimberSalesID split(not(isNull(Derived_Timber_Sales_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Quantity)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Quantity)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Derived_Production_Cost)),not(isNull(Production_Cost)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Stumpage)),not(isNull(Derived_Stumpage)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Unit_Stumpage)),not(isNull(Derived_Unit_Stumpage)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Average_Sales_Price)),not(isNull(Derived_Average_Sales_Price)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Quantity)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Sales_Quantity)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Sales_Revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Production_Cost)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Production_Cost)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Stumpage)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Stumpage)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedTimberSalesIDandDateandDecimal@(ValidDateAndTimberSalesIDandNumbers, InvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Timber_Sales_ID = toInteger(Timber_Sales_ID),
		Derived_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Production_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Stumpage = toDecimal(Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Average_Sales_Price = toDecimal(Average_Sales_Price, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Production_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Stumpage = toDecimal(Budget_Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####")) ~> ConvertDateAndTimberSalesID
InvalidDateOrTimberSalesIDOrNumbererrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers
ValidatedTimberSalesIDandDateandDecimal@InvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period  / Timber Sales ID / Sales Quantity / Sales Revenue / Production Cost / Stumpage / Unit Stumpage / Average Sale Price / Budget Sale Quantity / Budget Sale Revenue / Budget Production Cost / Budget Stumpage")) ~> InvalidDateOrTimberSalesIDOrNumbererrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidSpeciesType, IsValidSpeciesType@ValidSpeciesType, SelectInvalidSalesUnit union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalSpeciesType lookup(Species_Code == Relation_Species_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalSpeciesType
RelationalSpeciesType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Species_Code = Species_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalSpeciesType
LookupRelationalSpeciesType split(not(isNull(Relation_Species_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidSpeciesType@(ValidSpeciesType, InvalidSpeciesType)
IsValidSpeciesType@InvalidSpeciesType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Species Code")) ~> InvalidSpeciesTypeerrormessage
InvalidSpeciesTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidSpeciesType
RelationalProductType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Product_Type_Code = Product_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalProductType
RelationalPricePoint select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Price_Point_Code = Price_Point_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalPricePoint
RelationalSalesUnit select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Sales_Unit_Code = Sales_Unit_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalSalesUnit
IsValidSpeciesType@ValidSpeciesType, SelectRelationalSalesUnit lookup(Sales_Unit_Code == Relation_Sales_Unit_Code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSalesUnit
LookupSalesUnit split(not(isNull(Relation_Sales_Unit_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidSalesUnit@(ValidSalesUnit, InvalidSalesUnit)
IsValidSalesUnit@InvalidSalesUnit derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Sales Unit Code")) ~> InvalidSaleUniterrormessage
InvalidSaleUniterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidSalesUnit
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as string,
		Sales_Revenue as string,
		Production_Cost as string,
		Stumpage as string,
		Unit_Stumpage as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Production_Cost as string,
		Budget_Stumpage as string,
		Validation_Error as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Sales_Month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product = Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point = Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Validation_Error,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Sales_Month
	)) ~> StagingDB

transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		type as string,
		properties as (Asset_Id as string, Fund_Id as string, OBJECTID as string, Property as string, Crop_Type as string, Plant_Year as string, State as string, Area_Ha as double, SHAPE_Leng as double, SHAPE_Area as double),
		geometry as (type as string, coordinates as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	backslashEscape: true) ~> geojsonmodified
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = asset_id,
		Fund_ID = fund_id,
		Loc_Json = loc_json
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
geojsonmodified derive({_corrupt_record} = toString(byName('_corrupt_record')),
		asset_id = properties.Asset_Id,
		fund_id = properties.Fund_Id,
		loc_json = geometry.coordinates) ~> MapDrifted2
MapDrifted2 filter(not(isNull(asset_id))) ~> Filter1
Select1 sink(input(
		asset_id as string,
		fund_id as string,
		loc_geometry as binary,
		loc_json as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		asset_id = Asset_ID,
		fund_id = Fund_ID,
		loc_json = Loc_Json
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Adjustments]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Adjustments]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_ASSET_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Budgets]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_COA_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],

FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MYO_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM staging.Forecast_Asset_reference
  WHERE Validation_Error IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_FX_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_FUND_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],

	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_GLALLOCATE_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],

	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],

	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],

	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_GLPRODUCT_%'

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[Myob_Actuals]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

  FROM [staging].[OPS_Answers]

  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL
